name: seo-geo-health-checker
description: Comprehensive SEO & GEO health checker with end-to-end testing suite

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.build:all: cd backend && npm run build && cd ../frontend && npm run build
scripts.test:unit: cd backend && npm test && cd ../frontend && npm test -- --watchAll=false
scripts.test:all: npm run test:unit && npm run test:e2e
scripts.lint:all: cd backend && npm run lint && cd ../frontend && npm run lint
scripts.clean: rm -rf backend/dist backend/node_modules frontend/build frontend/node_modules node_modules coverage

author: SEO GEO Health Checker Team
